sentences.en: AIM : To evaluate the effect of surgical treatment of concomitant exotropia and analyze the influential factors.
sentences.cn: 目的:分 析共同性外斜视的手术疗效及其可能的影响因素.

sentences.en: Concomitant use with other acne clear series will better the effect.
sentences.cn: 与其他粉刺净颜系列产品搭配使用,效果更佳.

sentences.en: Deafness is a frequent concomitant of old age.
sentences.cn: 耳聋是老年伴随而来的现象.

sentences.en: Herein, we present the case of a 79 - year - old male with pulmonary tuberculosis and concomitant tuberculous tenosynovitis.
sentences.cn: 在此我们报告一例79 岁 男性病患同时罹患肺结核合并腕结核性腱鞘炎,结核性腱鞘炎经三个月延迟后才被确认.

sentences.en: It looks like a case of chronic sinusitis with concomitant nasal polyps.
sentences.cn: 看来像慢性鼻窦炎并伴发息肉.

sentences.en: Loss of memory is a natural concomitant of old age.
sentences.cn: 记忆力减退是与老年相伴出现的.

sentences.en: Neutrophilic granulocytopenia concomitant with aplastic anemia.
sentences.cn: 再生障碍性贫血伴发的中性粒细胞减少症.

sentences.en: Neutrophilic granulocytopenia concomitant with myelodysplastic syndrome.
sentences.cn: 骨髓异常增生综合症伴发的中性粒细胞减少症.

sentences.en: Objective To analyze environmental factors of the discordance of concomitant strabismus phenotypes in monozygotic twins.
sentences.cn: 目的通过分析单卵双胎儿表型不一致性共同性斜视发病因素,探讨其发病机制.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the horizontal concomitant strabismus angle and the operative quantity.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨水平斜视的斜视度及手术量问题.

sentences.en: Others argue that OFCs may be an inevitable concomitant of globalisation.
sentences.cn: 因为这能使得那些傲慢的大国有所收敛.

sentences.en: The accomplishment of these multiple purposes usually requires the concomitant use of two or three drugs.
sentences.cn: 为了使这些目的都能达到,通常需要同时应用2～3种药物.

sentences.en: The effects appear to arise partly as a result of the concomitant changes in deformation behaviour.
sentences.cn: 看来这种效应是随之而来的变形行为发生变化的部分原因.

sentences.en: This approach was concomitant with the move away from relying solely on official records.
sentences.cn: 这种方法是随着不再单纯依靠官方记录的做法而产生的。

sentences.en: war with all its concomitant sufferings
sentences.cn: 战争及其引起的一切苦难

sentences.en: When patients have a concomitant disease or injury indicating antibiotics, they should be used.
sentences.cn: 当病人同时患有具有抗菌适应症的疾病或损伤时, 应该应用抗菌素.

trans.tran_cn: 伴随的，同时发生或出现的
trans.tran_en: existing or happening together, especially as a result of something

trans.tran_cn: 伴随发生的事，伴随物，共存
trans.tran_en: something that often or naturally happens with something else
